Translations.Text: Nweeea i Musa: "ooue s ugdud iW, deg iv, acku a kwen in vefoen
Iuzen Feraun ineccaden ar temdinin
wigi, s tidep, d arbaa amejiue
u nitni, s tidep, sserfan a
Nekwni, Neqquoa akken ma nella
Ihi, Nessuffe$ iten id si tebeirin akked tliwa
igerrujen, ixxamen ukyisen
Akka, nweooet yissen, At Isoail
Vefoen ten mi d inqeo yiiij
Mi mwalan irebbuyaa, nnan imeddukwal n Musa: "aql a$ a nepwaleeq
Inna: "xaii! Mass iw, s tidep, yidi. Ad iyi Inhu
Nweeea i Musa: "wwet ill s taakwazt ik"! Imfaoaq, yal loiha am udrar ameqwoaean
Nessqeob ed wiyav ar dinna
Nsellek Musa, akked wid akw iddan yides
Sinna ne$oeq wiyav
Deg wayagi, s tidep, d assekni. Tegwti degsen ur uminen
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Eeku yasen d tamacahup n Iboahim
Mi inna i baba s akked ugdud is: "d acu taabdem
Nnan: "naabed tiaancuoin, mazal a tent njjem
Inna: "day awen d sellent, ma tnujem
Ne$ nefaant kwen, ne$ vuooent kwen
Nnan: "xaii, nufa d imezwura nne$, akka ay xeddmen
Inna: "day twalam ayen la taabdem
kunwi akked lejdud nnwen imenza
Nitni d icenga w. Siwa kan Mass imavalen
iyi Ixelqen; Neppa iyi Inhan
Neppa iyi Icceccan, iyi Isswan
Neppa iyi Isseeluyen ma uvne
ara iyi In$en, sinna, ara iyi d Ssidren
u, oe$be$, d Win ara Isemmeen tuccva w, ass iqeiiiyen
A Mass iw, Â£it iyi d, s uuwab. Ssemlil iyi d iaaoviyen
Err awal iw, d win n tidep, i ineggura
Err iyi si lweooat n Loennet n ssuaada
Semmee i baba. Neppa, s tidep, illa seg im$eooqen
Ur iyi Xezzu, ass n tnekra nnsen
ass ideg ur infaa wayla, ne$ derya
siwa win iqublen Oebbi, s wul unuie
A d teppae Loennet, ar wid ipeezziben
A d innunnet ujajie ar im$eooqen
Ad asen inin: "anda ten wid tellam taabdem
war Oebbi? Day a kwen ssellken, ne$ ad ssellken iman nnsen
Ad pwagren degs, nitni, akked wid i$elien
akked laaskeo n Iblis, akken ma llan
Ad inin; u nitni, degs, ppemqellaan
s Oebbi, ar nella di ttelfan n uuee
mi kwen nessaadel ar Mass imavalen
D ibe$wviyen kan i a$ itelfen
Ur nesai imcafaen
ne$ aebib i $ ieemmlen
Lemmer ad as nales, a nili d lmumnin
Deg wayagi, s tidep, assekni. Tegwti, degsen, ur uminen
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Agdud n Nue iskaddeb imazanen
Mi sen inna gmat sen Nue: "day ur tepeezzibem ara
Nek, $uowen, d amazan muman
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat, ilmend n waya. Ih, taqdiat iw, apan kan, ar Mass imavalen
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
